text: Rajasekhar Sudmoon is a Indian film director, writer, cinematographer, editor and production designer. He is known for his works in Telugu cinema. == Career == Rajasekhar started his career in 2020 with short films such as Beauty, and Proportional Hearts. In 2023, he released his first full-length feature film Sagiletikatha. Sudmoon has previously worked with Indian filmmaker Ram Gopal Varma on his projects. He also received support from Varma during the making of Sagiletikatha. Sudmoon also worked as a production designer in Detective Karthik. == References == == Other websites == Category:Living people Category:Indian movie directors Category:Indian movie producers
title: Rajasekhar Sudmoon
